column5:
• Elearning has been around us for about a decade now
  • Elearning is a fascinating gift to the humanity
  • An overrated phenomenon of this century

• Won't say neccessary but Elearning is a good thing and people can definitely benefit from this
  • Elearning is clearly the future of Education
  • Elearning is not an alternative and could never be

• Some of the reputated sites and organization provides quality content on internet
  • almost every Elearning resource is neatly organized according to the syllabus
  • Elearning study materials can be too much focused sometimes that restricts a student's creativity and imagination

• Ease of access to knowledge is eminent in today's society
  • A student should learn their subject fast and easy so that the brain is less pressurized
  • Easing out learning process doesn't help in brain's growth, A student must research for themselves about the subjects

• Students don't have to take notes on everything they can just replay the videos
  • yeah, kind of agree with that but it also means they can utilize the time more efficiently
  • they don?t put in as much efforts as compared to students who were used to before this elearning evolution

• Human interactions are rare, although in some cases they allow email communication with the faculty
  • if topics are discussed neatly to the point, then I don?t think human interactions are needed just for the sake of it
  • face to face communication is important for overall development of the student.

• This is a great advantage of Elearning you can learn absolutely anywhere anytime
  • One can learn anything at anywhere,this is most important in today's society
  • Still, there are some soft skills we develop passively when we go to a learning place at a fixed time, it also helps us concentrate, but will agree with you in this

• Well, we can come to a conclusion that Elearning should not be discouraged as it has already become an integral part of our life. But its definitely not an alternative for the conventional education system. A guided Elearning process alongside formal schooling is best
  • Hold my beer
  • yeah, I agree to that
